#id=1
#text=I was very excited to go on a train trip .
#id=2
#text=I went over to the ticket counter and gave the teller the money I had saved for my ticket .
#id=3
#text=I could hardly wait until the train finally arrived .
#id=4
#text=I climbed aboard , put my suitcases next to all the other people 's suitcases , and found a seat .
#id=5
#text=Once the train started going , the conductor came by to punch everyone 's tickets .
#id=6
#text=I gladly handed him mine to be punched .
#id=7
#text=After that , I decided I would get some lunch .
#id=8
#text=I walked to the back of the train to the lunch car and ordered some food .
#id=9
#text=It was fun to eat while watching the world pass by through the window as the train rolled down the tracks .
#text=Before I knew it , we had arrived at the destination .
#text=I gathered up my things , grabbed my suitcase , and climbed down out of the train as the conductor gave me a hand .
#text=It had been a very fun trip , and I ca n't wait to ride again .
